department: NSRIT Autonomous, Department of CSE, CSM & CSD
description: This 2-day workshop is designed to protect systems, networks, and data from cyber threats. Participants will gain hands-on experience with Kali Linux, Nmap, and real-world hacking tools. They will learn to secure Wi-Fi networks and systems from common cyberattacks, and understand advanced techniques like MITM attacks, dark web usage, and bug bounty hunting. The workshop also includes building practical problem-solving skills through a Capture the Flag challenge.
prizes: Awards for top performers in the Capture the Flag challenge.
additional_info: This is a 2-day workshop organized by NSRIT Autonomous, Department of CSE, CSM & CSD, possibly in association with ACM and Computer Society of India (CSI) given the logos.
raw_text: NSRIT AUTONOMOUS 2-DAY WORKSHOP ON CYBER SECURITY 10th & 11th Oct, 2025 Designed to protect systems, networks and data from cyber threats. Registration fee:150/- Gain hands-on experience with kali Linux, Nmap, and real-world hacking tools. Learn to secure Wi-Fi networks and systems from common cyberattacks Understand advanced techniques like MITM attacks, dark Web usage, and Bug Bounty hunting Build Practical problem-solving skill through a Capture the flag challenge with awards for top performers Department of CSE, CSM & CSD ACM CSI Scanned with OKEN Scanner
